name: City Racing: Futuristic Drivin
description:
Take control of your crazy car by going behind the wheels, use nitro to get the top speed of the car in city racing and drift

Features:
- Its Free for life time!
- Drive and customise the most speedy cars
- Extreme Fast racing tracks
- Real 3D Graphics and tracks
- Slow motion Camera effects while car flying
- Most realistic car dynamics( brakes, engine, acceleration, brakes, drifts, etc)
